original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，為青州太守。被黃巾軍圍城將陷，向劉焉求援，得劉備、關羽、張飛之助，合兵擊退黃巾軍。
text: The fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is the Qingzhou prefect. After being besieged by the Yellow Turban Army, he asked Liu Yan for help. With the help of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, they repelled the Yellow Turban Army together.
